item.title: A Shiny New World
item.description: Disclaimer (and maybe dissapointment): This has no connection to Huxleyâ€™s dystopian. Jump to Section: Brief Introduction Example Apps Resources for Beginners Introduction I recently gave a talk at a meetup in Chicago about an R Shiny app I am working on called IDBac. While there are plenty of example apps for Shiny I also wanted to create some examples of my own for now and any future instruction.
